titles.title: Secure Trade Act
Secure Trade Act
To impose additional duties on imports of goods into the United States, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Ways and Means, and in addition to the Committees on Financial Services, Foreign Affairs, and Energy and Commerce, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
